about.title: ğŸŒŸ Introducing Askstar
about.intro: Askstar began when I heard an astrologer mention the 'Ascendant' on a Korean TV show.
about.ascendantExplanation: The Ascendant is the zodiac sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at the moment of your birth, receiving energies from both heaven and earth. This was a completely different interpretation from the birthday-based zodiac sign we commonly know.
about.question: "Could there be multiple interpretations of my zodiac sign?"
about.motivation: Starting with this curiosity, I discovered that adding just three criteria makes the astrological description of oneself much richer, which fascinated me and led to the creation of this site.
about.big3Title: ğŸŒ™ The Big 3: Three Zodiac Signs to Understand Yourself
about.sunSignTitle: â˜€ï¸ Sun Sign - Our Core, External Personality
about.sunSignDesc: The Sun Sign is the zodiac sign where the sun was positioned in the sky on the day you were born. When people ask "What's your sign?", they're referring to your Sun Sign. It represents your external personality and the major direction of your life.
about.moonSignTitle: ğŸŒ™ Moon Sign - Your Inner Self, Emotions and Sensitivity
about.moonSignDesc: The Moon Sign is the zodiac sign where the moon was positioned at the moment of your birth. While the Sun Sign represents your external personality, the Moon Sign reveals your hidden inner emotions. Simply put, it's related to "who you really are when alone or only with close friends."
about.ascendantTitle: â­ Ascendant (Rising Sign) - How Others See You
about.ascendantDesc: The Ascendant is the zodiac sign that was rising on the eastern horizon at the moment of your birth. Receiving energies from both heaven and earth, the Rising Sign is considered especially important nowadays. It's like a mask over the self represented by your Sun Sign, similar to your outward appearance. In other words, it represents your first impression and external image as seen by others.
about.experienceTitle: âœ¨ A Mystical Experience of Asking the Stars
about.experienceDesc1: Askstar offers a mystical experience beyond simple astrological analysis, as if you're actually hearing stories from the stars. With UI and branding that capture the mystery of the universe and the depth of astrology, we bring you your own special zodiac story.
about.experienceDesc2: Discover a deeper, richer image of yourself through your Big 3. Your own story told by the stars awaits you.
about.startButton: ğŸŒŸ Start now and hear your own zodiac story
